author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

Backport of #39245. Fixes a rare scheduling bug that was observed at the HLT in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/39064 (that was first mitigated in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/39211).

#### PR validation:

Original development. The reproducer I mentioned in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/39064#issuecomment-1228755900 succeeds with this change. Framework unit tests pass.
title: [12_4_X] Release dependent modules only after the worker has finished for scheduled modules
